title: Ticket #6001: Reauthentication timer computation broken in GCE GAHP.
description:
On Tue, Nov 8, 2016 at 2:09 PM, Burt Holzman <burt@fnal.gov> wrote: > Ok, I took a look at this. > > if ( auth_entry.m_expiration < time(NULL) - (5 * 60) ) { > > I might be delirious from sitting in a review all day, but is the sign > right: shouldn’t this be + (5 * 60)?

On Wed, 9 Nov 2016, Jaime Frey wrote: > Yes, the subtraction is definitely wrong.
creator: tlmiller
